properties.entry: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.R_TITLE, R.R_CONTENT, R.R_DATE, P.P_TITLE FROM REVIEW R JOIN PLACE P ON R.PLAY_NO = P.P_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY R.R_DATE DESC
SELECT COM_NO, COM_CONTENT, SCORE, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, ONE_NO FROM ONE_COMMENT WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
SELECT INQUIRE_NO,INQUIRE_TITLE,USER_NAME,CREATE_DATE,I.STATUS FROM INQUIRE I JOIN MEMBER ON USER_NO = INQUIRE_WRITER WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE, INQUIRE_NO
